The efficiency of a machine is always less than 100% because the

options.a: velocity ratio is always greater than the mechanical advantage.
options.b: work output is always greater than the work input.
options.c: effort applied is always greater than the load lifted.
options.d: load lifted is always greater than the effort applied.
